net.jxta.impl.content.defprovider
Class DefaultContentShare

java.lang.Object
  net.jxta.impl.content.AbstractContentShare<T,U>
      net.jxta.impl.content.AbstractPipeContentShare<ContentAdvertisement,DefaultContentShareAdvertisementImpl>
          net.jxta.impl.content.defprovider.DefaultContentShare
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentShare
public class DefaultContentShare
extends AbstractPipeContentShare<ContentAdvertisement,DefaultContentShareAdvertisementImpl>

Implementation of the ContentShare interface for use in the default implementation. This class implements the bare minimum requirements for a Content share implementation and will likely always need to be extended by the provider implementation to be useful.

Constructor Summary

DefaultContentShare

public DefaultContentShare(DefaultContentProvider origin,
                           Content content,
                           PipeAdvertisement pipeAdv)
Construct a new DefaultContentShare object, generating a new PipeAdvertisement.

Parameters:
origin - content provider sharing this content
content - content object to share
pipeAdv - pipe used to contact the server
Method Detail

protected DefaultContentShareAdvertisementImpl createContentShareAdvertisement()
